summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.5°C) and outside temperature (down 6.1°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 17%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 16743 lux) and cloud levels (up 514 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15811 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 325 m), and outside humidity (down 9%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, dry and less humid conditions and mostly calm with light air movement. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and dim or diffuse light conditions. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
